statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, date_of_birth FROM customer_data WHERE insurance_plan = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, phone_number, address FROM customer_data ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = '98765432-abcd-1234-efgh-0987654321ab';
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE insurance_plan = 'Gold Plan' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_data WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT customer_id, policy_type, coverage_amount FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, policy_type, premium FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM customers JOIN insurance_policies ON customers.customer_id = insurance_policies.customer_id ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, coverage_amount FROM policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_type, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.policy_type, c.email FROM customers c JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.coverage_amount > 10000;
SELECT p.policy_id, COUNT(cl.claim_id) AS num_claims FROM policies p LEFT JOIN claims cl ON p.policy_id = cl.policy_id GROUP BY p.policy_id;

SELECT c.name, SUM(cl.claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM customers c JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN claims cl ON p.policy_id = cl.policy_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY total_claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT policy_type, coverage_amount, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT offer_id, policy_id, offer_details FROM offers WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT o.offer_details, p.policy_type, c.claim_amount FROM offers o JOIN policies p ON o.policy_id = p.policy_id JOIN claims c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.policy_type, o.offer_details FROM customers c INNER JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id LEFT JOIN offers o ON p.policy_id = o.policy_id WHERE p.coverage_amount > 50000;
SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_policies FROM customers c JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING num_policies > 2 ORDER BY num_policies DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_policies FROM policies GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT status, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM claims GROUP BY status ORDER BY total_claim_amount DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, date_of_birth FROM customers ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM applications WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claims FROM claims GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_claims > 10000;
